items.title: Trump says he has 'no intention' of firing Fed Chair Powell
items.description: Powell, whom Trump appointed Fed chair during his first term as president, has flatly stated that the president cannot remove him under the law.

items.title: U.S. public schools brace for ‘fiscal cliff’ after surge in hiring meets budget shortfalls
items.description: Federal pandemic-era funding masked budget gaps tied to enrollment loss. With that money gone, many U.S. schools are making deep cuts to stay afloat.

items.title: Bessent says he expects 'de-escalation' in U.S.-China tariff fight in the 'very near future'
items.description: Stocks, already recovering from the prior day's sell-off, soared higher on news of the remarks from Trump Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.

items.title: Trump administration proposes major shake-up of U.S. State Department
items.description: The shake-up comes as part of an unprecedented push by Trump and his billionaire adviser Elon Musk to shrink the federal government.

items.title: Trump stands 'strongly behind' Hegseth, White House says
items.description: Pete Hegseth is under scrutiny again, after the Defense Secretary reportedly discussed highly sensitive military plans in a Signal chat with his famil...
